Sentencas: This paper presents a detailed surface reaction mechanism for the decomposition of NH3 to H-2 and N-2 on a Ni surface.
Titulo: Micro-kinetic modeling of NH3 decomposition on Ni and its application to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mechanism is validated for temperatures ranging from 700 to 1500 K and pressures from 5.3 Pa to 100 kPa.
Titulo: Micro-kinetic modeling of NH3 decomposition on Ni and its application to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The activation energies for various elementary steps are calculated using the unity bond index-quadratic exponential potential (UBI-QEP) method.
Titulo: Micro-kinetic modeling of NH3 decomposition on Ni and its application to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis is carried out to study the influence of various kinetic parameters on reaction rates.
Titulo: Micro-kinetic modeling of NH3 decomposition on Ni and its application to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The NH3 decomposition mechanism is used to simulate SOFC button cell operating on NH3 fuel.
Titulo: Micro-kinetic modeling of NH3 decomposition on Ni and its application to solid oxide fuel cells
